fields.text: You're about to reset the game. Are you sure?

thenRoutine.note: deal each player a new hand from holder-deck-r3
move leftover cards in hand to holder-deck-r3
then deal each player a new hand from holder-deck-r2

elseRoutine.note: else, it must be round 1... move leftover cards in hand to holder-deck-r2
deal each player a new hand from holder-deck-r1

info.name: Silent Spectre
info.attribution:

The following graphics are from https://game-icons.net and are used under CC BY 3.0:

info.description: Play out your spectres wisely so they go unnoticed.

fields.text: Some players still have cards in hand, indicating the previous trick has not been cleared yet. Are you sure you want to start a new round?
Some players still have more than 2 cards in hand. Are you sure you want to clear trick?
